languages.text: "Главное что вернулась..." {n}— тихо ворчит Идира.{/n} "А то мне без злобного зырканья и праведных речей как-то не по себе было".
"What matters is that you're back," {n}Idira grumbles quietly.{/n} "'Cause it's just been weird without your disapproving scowls and righteous speeches."
languages.original_text: "Главное что вернулась..." {n}— тихо ворчит Идира.{/n} "А то мне без злобного зырканья и праведных речей как-то не по себе было".

traits.locale_text: "What matters is that you're back," {n}Idira grumbles quietly.{/n} "'Cause it's just been weird without your disapproving scowls and righteous speeches."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What matters is that you're back," {n}Idira grumbles quietly.{/n} "'Cause it's just been weird without your disapproving scowls and righteous speeches."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「大事なのは、あなたが戻ったということ」{n}イディラは静かにぼやいた。{/n}「だって、あなたのあの変な非難めいたしかめっ面と正義の言葉がなかったせいで、変な感じだったのよ」
languages.original_text: "What matters is that you're back," {n}Idira grumbles quietly.{/n} "'Cause it's just been weird without your disapproving scowls and righteous speeches."

traits.locale_text: 「大事なのは、あなたが戻ったということ」{n}イディラは静かにぼやいた。{/n}「だって、あなたのあの変な非難めいたしかめっ面と正義の言葉がなかったせいで、変な感じだったのよ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “只要你回来了就好。”{n}伊迪拉轻声嘟囔着。{/n}“毕竟你见到我，既没有不满地皱着眉，也没有那些正义的说教，这让我有点不太习惯。”
languages.original_text: "What matters is that you're back," {n}Idira grumbles quietly.{/n} "'Cause it's just been weird without your disapproving scowls and righteous speeches."

traits.locale_text: “只要你回来了就好。”{n}伊迪拉轻声嘟囔着。{/n}“毕竟你见到我，既没有不满地皱着眉，也没有那些正义的说教，这让我有点不太习惯。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « L'essentiel, c'est que vous soyez de retour, {n}marmonne Idira.{/n} Vous n'allez pas le croire, mais vos regards désapprobateurs et vos sermons moralisateurs m'ont manqué. »
languages.original_text: "What matters is that you're back," {n}Idira grumbles quietly.{/n} "'Cause it's just been weird without your disapproving scowls and righteous speeches."

traits.locale_text: « L'essentiel, c'est que vous soyez de retour, {n}marmonne Idira.{/n} Vous n'allez pas le croire, mais vos regards désapprobateurs et vos sermons moralisateurs m'ont manqué. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Lo que importa es que ha vuelto», {n}refunfuña Idira en voz baja.{/n} «Las cosas no son lo mismo sin sus miradas de desaprobación y discursos justicieros».
languages.original_text: "What matters is that you're back," {n}Idira grumbles quietly.{/n} "'Cause it's just been weird without your disapproving scowls and righteous speeches."

traits.locale_text: «Lo que importa es que ha vuelto», {n}refunfuña Idira en voz baja.{/n} «Las cosas no son lo mismo sin sus miradas de desaprobación y discursos justicieros».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Wichtig ist nur, dass Ihr zurück seid", {n}murmelt Idira leise.{/n} "Denn es war sehr komisch ohne Eure missbilligenden finsteren Blicke und die rechtschaffenen Ansprachen."
languages.original_text: "What matters is that you're back," {n}Idira grumbles quietly.{/n} "'Cause it's just been weird without your disapproving scowls and righteous speeches."

traits.locale_text: "Wichtig ist nur, dass Ihr zurück seid", {n}murmelt Idira leise.{/n} "Denn es war sehr komisch ohne Eure missbilligenden finsteren Blicke und die rechtschaffenen Ansprachen."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Önemli olan geri dönmüş olman..." {n}İdira, alçak sesle homurdanıyor.{/n} "Sen yokken kimse kaşını çatarak insanları kınamıyor, erdemli vaazlar vermiyordu. İnsan garipsiyor..."
languages.original_text: "What matters is that you're back," {n}Idira grumbles quietly.{/n} "'Cause it's just been weird without your disapproving scowls and righteous speeches."

traits.locale_text: "Önemli olan geri dönmüş olman..." {n}İdira alçak sesle homurdanıyor.{/n} "Sen yokken kimse kaşını çatarak insanları kınamıyor, erdemli vaazlar vermiyordu. İnsan garipsiyor..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
